text_block_list.text:
One, two...! 
King, stop right there!!
text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario

text_block_list.text:
Eh, heh, heh! We're not letting you 
escape! Right, Cesario?
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
That's right. 
We're giving you one year's worth 
of our feelings...
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
With a hug! As our way to congratulate 
you on your birthday!
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
With all of our affection that's been 
piling up! Me from the front, Cesario 
from behind!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
There's no getting away! 
I hope you're ready, King!
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
...! *chuckles* 
You dummies. What's all this about 
me escaping and running away?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
I had no intention to from the start! 
Bring it on, you two!
text_block_list.name: King Halo
